name: Patisserie Palette
description:
Play as The Girl and her pal Chinchilly the chinchilla as they navigate this black-and-white and colorful dual universe.  Solve puzzles to collect items that can help The Girl understand her story.  Players can lead with either The Girl or Chinchilly, thereby granting access to different worlds.  🎂

WASD - movement

E - interact

Esc - reset the scene

Created for Northwestern's Game Design course by:

Alyssa Liu

Kyle Engelmann
